blog.description: Writing and Stuff from Isaac Z. Schlueter
blog.name: izs
blog.title: blog.izs.me

body:
8:34:07 PM izs: hahahah: "What percentage of people who don't own a TV, like to tell you at every single opportunity that they don't own a TV."
8:44:46 PM seldo: TV is evil.
8:44:49 PM seldo: TV is the mind-killer.
8:45:11 PM izs: TV is the little death that brings total obliteration
8:45:02 PM seldo: Now shut up, I'm watching Hulu.

title: Television
